multiLens¶

This software aims to model multi plane lensing in a ray-tracing approach.

Feedback¶

If you have any suggestions or questions about multiLens feel free to email me at simon.birrer@phys.ethz.ch.

If you encounter any errors or problems with multiLens, please let me know!
